titleStmt.title: Ariana In two parts. As it was translated out of the French, and presented to my Lord Chamberlaine.
Ariane. English
titleStmt.author: Desmarets de Saint-Sorlin, Jean, 1595-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland, for Thomas Walkley,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Desmarets de Saint-Sorlin, Jean. Ariane.
With an additional title page, engraved.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
